statements.select: select * from PCEarplugsDecibelCheckDetail where PCEarplugsDecibelCheckId=#value# order by Number

select pcd.* from PCEarplugsDecibelCheckDetail pcd left join InvoiceXO xo on pcd.InvoiceXOId=xo.InvoiceId where PCEarplugsDecibelCheckId in (select PCEarplugsDecibelCheckId from PCEarplugsDecibelCheck where PCEarplugsDecibelCheckDate between #startDate# and #endDate#) and (ProductId=#productId# or #productId# is null) and (xo.CustomerInvoiceXOId=#cusXOId# or #cusXOId# is null) order by pcd.Number
